sent.orig: All bodies consist of molecules and these (molecules consist) of atoms.
sent.trans: 一切物质都由分子组成，而分子由原子组成。

sent.orig: These consist of small grains of monocrystalline silicon. The cells consist of many small, shiny elements.
sent.trans: 多晶硅电池含有细小颗粒的单晶硅，它含有很多细小光亮的成分。

sent.orig: They consist of a single integrated circuit on a chip.
sent.trans: 它们在芯片中包含了一个简单的集成电路。

sent.orig: These stupas consist of Mandala with five Buddhas.
sent.trans: 五佛义理出现较晚，源自显宗华严思想。

sent.orig: The sympathetic ganglia consist of two chains of 22 segmentally arranged ganglia lateral to the column.
sent.trans: 该交感神经节连续两个连锁店22日节段性安排神经节外侧向脊柱。
